title: Is there a security update coming for Pixel 2? Will my issues be addressed?
content: Updating to Android 11 was my worst decisions of all. My phone is now draining battery more, some issues with going fullscreen in games, network issues(unable to make calls but can receive them) and some minor bugs. Please tell me is there updates coming on Android 11 for pixel 2 in which these major setbacks are resolved.
